page.title: 16RON RANSON- WATER COLOURIST
page.content: Mr.Ranson became interested in watercolour painting when he was fifty. He had lost his job as a publicity manager and wanted to try his hand at painting.He has become a highly successful water-colour paint- er. In the past nine years he has painted one thousand pictures and sold about nine hundred of them. He enjoys painting the Wye Valley most,and he holds Wye Valley water- colour weekends at his home. People come from all over the world to learn his technique.His son has formed a business producing prints and cards from his paintings.He has sold many hundreds of them.He has written a book about Water Colour painting which has already sold fifteen thousand copies. He has appeared on television and a video has been made explaining his technique.
